member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_REVOCATION_INFO structure indicates the revocation status of a certificate in a CERT_CHAIN_ELEMENT.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: Size of this structure in bytes.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_INFO.pszRevocationOid
member.summary: Not currently used and is set to NULL.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_INFO.pvOidSpecificInfo
member.summary: Not currently used and is set to NULL.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_INFO.fHasFreshnessTime
member.summary: BOOL set to TRUE if dwFreshnessTime has been updated.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_INFO.dwFreshnessTime
member.summary: If fHasFreshnessTime is TRUE, holds the CurrentTime minus the certificate revocation list's (CRL's). This time is in seconds.

member.name: CERT_REVOCATION_INFO.pCrlInfo
member.summary: For CRL base revocation checking, a non-NULL pointer to a CERT_REVOCATION_CRL_INFO structure.
